name: Tapestry Connector
summary: A TAPESTRY file is a connector file used by The Iconfactory Tapestry, a content feed aggregator for iOS and iPadOS. It contains information describing a feed and instructions for how Tapestry can load it. Users can install TAPESTRY connectors in Tapestry to add supported apps and services from which the app can pull feeds.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
